name: Economic MeetUp: Civil War
description:
< About the Game >

It's a competitive game with elements of strategy and platform, creating a unique experience in local multiplayer games. Two Teams, Two Bases, One Winner! Destroy your enemy and drink a beer to us...

< Features >

  • Local Multiplayer
  • Resource Management
  • Many strategies to Win
  • Tactical Units: Soldat, Spy, Tank & Kamikaze.
  • Tons Of Fun!

2nd place in UCV GameDev Contest 2015 (Contest Edition).
